name: Table Tennis (itch) (#calcifer_3118)
description:
A cool JavaScript game which runs in your browser and you can play it with your hands, I mean literally with hands not with mouse or keyboard.

It uses a machine learning model from mediapie which allows it to track the position of your hand through webcam feed, which it uses to control the racket.

It also uses other libraries like Three.js for 3d, Cannon.js for physics, and gsap for animations,

I hope you enjoy the game,!!!

Please share your valuable feedback and feel free to contact me: dheer.gamedev@gmail.com
